job_post_data.title: Full-Stack Dev to Build Custom B2B SaaS Portal (React/Node)
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a team to build a secure, multi-tenant B2B portal from scratch. It must handle user roles, payment integration (Stripe), and a data visualization dashboard. Focus is on robust security and clean UI/UX.

job_post_data.title: AI/ML Engineer for Real-Time Inventory Forecasting Model
job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking a data scientist to build an **AI forecasting model** to predict inventory demand based on historical sales and seasonal data. Must integrate with our existing ERP via Python API. Short PoC project, high pay.

job_post_data.title: Cross-Platform Mobile App MVP (Flutter) for Field Service Tracking
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a simple **mobile application MVP** built in Flutter for iOS and Android. It must track technician location (GPS), allow photo uploads of work completed, and sync data when offline.

job_post_data.title: DevOps Engineer for HIPAA Compliant Cloud Setup (Web App Focus)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking a DevOps expert to set up **HIPAA-compliant cloud infrastructure (AWS)** for our new telehealth web application. This is a one-time setup project focusing on security and compliance documentation.

job_post_data.title: Need a React Native Developer to Add AI Chatbot to Existing App
job_post_data.description_snippet: We have an existing **React Native app**. Need a freelancer to implement a new **OpenAI API chatbot** feature for customer support. Requires experience with custom chat UI and secure API key management.

job_post_data.title: Senior Python Backend Developer for Fintech API
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a highly secure, scalable **Python/Django backend** for a new payment processing API. Must be familiar with PCI compliance and microservices architecture.

job_post_data.title: iOS/Swift Developer needed for Health & Wellness App UI Refresh
job_post_data.description_snippet: Our existing **iOS app** needs a complete **UI/UX redesign** to improve user retention. Focus is on clean, modern design and native Swift development.

job_post_data.title: Machine Learning Engineer for Automated Image Tagging System (E-commerce)
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need an **ML model** to automatically tag product images in our **e-commerce** inventory. Must use **Computer Vision** (CV) techniques and integrate via AWS SageMaker.

job_post_data.title: WordPress/PHP Developer for Custom Dashboard Integration
job_post_data.description_snippet: Looking for a PHP expert to build a **custom administrative dashboard** plugin for WordPress. Must pull data from external REST APIs and provide data entry capabilities.

job_post_data.title: ReactJS Front-End Developer for Financial Data Visualization Tool
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a strong front-end **React developer** to implement complex **data visualizations** (charts, tables) for a financial reporting tool. Must be comfortable with D3.js or similar libraries.

job_post_data.title: Flutter Developer for Telehealth Patient Portal MVP
job_post_data.description_snippet: Building an **MVP telehealth mobile app**. Needs secure login, basic appointment scheduling, and video call integration. **Flutter** is required for cross-platform speed.

job_post_data.title: NLP Engineer for Legal Document Classification and Summary
job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking an **NLP expert** to build a system that classifies and generates short summaries for legal contracts. Experience with BERT or similar transformer models required.

job_post_data.title: GoLang Backend Developer for High-Volume E-commerce API
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a **GoLang developer** to optimize and expand our existing **e-commerce** microservices. Must handle 10k+ requests per second and maintain low latency.

job_post_data.title: Vue.js Developer for Custom HR Employee Portal
job_post_data.description_snippet: Looking for a **Vue.js expert** to build the front-end for a new internal **HR employee portal**. Needs components for benefits selection and PTO requests. Must adhere to strict accessibility standards.

job_post_data.title: AR/VR Developer for Industrial Training Simulation (Unity)
job_post_data.description_snippet: We require a developer proficient in **Unity** to build an **Augmented Reality (AR) training module** for complex industrial machinery operation. Needs a score tracking system.

job_post_data.title: Node.js Developer for Real-Time Chat System (Social App)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a **Node.js expert** to build a reliable, real-time chat feature for our **social networking mobile app**. Requires Socket.io and secure authentication.

job_post_data.title: Expert in Financial Fraud Detection (AI/ML Models)
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a **Senior ML Engineer** to optimize our existing **transactional fraud detection models**. Must have experience with anomaly detection in high-volume FinTech systems.

job_post_data.title: React/Redux Front-end for Supply Chain Tracking Dashboard
job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop the front-end of a complex **supply chain tracking web dashboard**. Requires proficiency with data tables, filtering, and mapping visualizations.

job_post_data.title: Native Android Developer for Fitness Tracking App MVP
job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking a dedicated **Native Android (Kotlin/Java) developer** to build an **MVP fitness tracker** that integrates with Google Fit and tracks user routes via GPS.

job_post_data.title: Blockchain Developer for NFT Marketplace Smart Contracts (Solidity)
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need an experienced **Solidity developer** to write, audit, and deploy the core **smart contracts** for a new **NFT marketplace** on the Polygon network.

job_post_data.title: ASP.NET Core Developer for Legacy System Migration (Internal Tool)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Migrate an outdated internal financial tracking tool from classic ASP to **ASP.NET Core** and move the database to Azure SQL. Focus on data fidelity and security.

job_post_data.title: Data Scientist for HR Attrition Prediction Model
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a **Data Scientist** to build a **predictive ML model** to identify employees at high risk of attrition using HR and survey data. Requires strong feature engineering skills.

job_post_data.title: Experienced Swift/iOS Developer for IoT Integration App
job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a **Native iOS app** to monitor and control small **IoT devices** in a smart home environment. Needs real-time data streaming and secure pairing (Bluetooth LE).

job_post_data.title: Full-Stack Laravel Developer for E-commerce B2B Portal
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a **Laravel/PHP expert** to build a B2B **e-commerce portal** with custom pricing tiers, quoting system, and deep inventory sync with our main database.

job_post_data.title: AWS Architect for Serverless Data Pipeline (AI Focus)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Design and implement a robust, serverless **data ingestion pipeline** on AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB) to feed data into our **AI/ML models** for weekly training runs.

job_post_data.title: React Native Developer for EdTech Quiz App (iOS/Android)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a simple, engaging **React Native quiz app** for an **EdTech** platform. Features include user scoring, progress tracking, and integration with a custom CMS API.

job_post_data.title: Node.js/TypeScript Developer for Custom CRM Integration
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a developer to build a robust **Node.js service** that syncs data in real-time between our internal system and Salesforce CRM. Focus on reliability and error handling.

job_post_data.title: Data Visualization Expert for Energy Consumption Dashboard (React)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a responsive **React web dashboard** to visualize real-time energy consumption data from industrial sensors. Must handle high-frequency data streams effectively.

job_post_data.title: Lead Mobile Developer (Native) for E-commerce Checkout Flow
job_post_data.description_snippet: Rebuild our entire **e-commerce mobile app checkout flow** (iOS/Android) for improved conversion. Must be highly secure and integrate multiple payment methods.

job_post_data.title: GenAI Prompt Engineer for Internal Support Chatbot
job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and fine-tune prompts and RAG pipeline for a **Generative AI chatbot** to handle internal IT support queries based on our knowledge base. Needs **OpenAI/Azure** experience.

job_post_data.title: Django/React Full-Stack for New EdTech Learning Platform
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a secure **EdTech learning platform** (SaaS) with user authentication, course progress tracking, and secure media streaming. **Django** backend with **React** frontend.

job_post_data.title: Senior Java Developer for High-Frequency Trading System Optimization
job_post_data.description_snippet: Optimize core components of a high-frequency trading application written in **Java**. Deep knowledge of concurrency, low latency, and garbage collection tuning is essential.

job_post_data.title: Cross-Platform Mobile Developer for Event Management App
job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop an event check-in and scheduling **mobile application** (preferably **React Native**) for large corporate events. Needs QR code scanning and offline data capabilities.

job_post_data.title: Computer Vision Engineer for Manufacturing Defect Detection
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need an experienced **Computer Vision Engineer** to train and deploy a model for real-time defect detection on an assembly line. Must be familiar with edge deployment.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a new internal **inventory management web application** from scratch using a modern **TypeScript** stack (e.g., NestJS/Next.js). Needs complex CRUD operations and barcode scanning via PWA.

job_post_data.title: iOS/Swift Developer to Integrate Custom Payment Gateway
job_post_data.description_snippet: Integrate a **custom payment gateway API** into our existing **iOS retail app**. Requires deep knowledge of secure transaction handling and Apple Pay integration.

job_post_data.title: UX/UI Designer for E-commerce Cart and Checkout Flow
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need an expert **UX/UI designer** to optimize and redesign the cart and checkout process for our high-volume **e-commerce website**. Deliverables include wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes (Figma).

job_post_data.title: Python Developer for Automated Reporting Tool (Internal)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a small **Python-based internal tool** that runs daily scripts to pull data from internal databases, generate PDF reports, and email them to stakeholders. Needs simple web interface for config.

job_post_data.title: Machine Learning Expert for Personalized EdTech Recommendations
job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and deploy a **personalized recommendation engine** for our **EdTech** platform to suggest courses based on user performance and history. Focus on collaborative filtering techniques.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a tenant-facing **React Native mobile app** for our property management system. Key features include maintenance request submission (with photos) and rent payment integration.

job_post_data.title: Angular Developer for Enterprise Dashboard UI
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a senior **Angular developer** to rebuild the UI of a complex enterprise monitoring dashboard. Must be proficient with state management (NgRx) and large, complex forms.

job_post_data.title: Security Expert for Penetration Testing (FinTech Web App)
job_post_data.description_snippet: Conduct a comprehensive **penetration test and security audit** on our new **FinTech web application**. Deliverables include detailed vulnerability reports and remediation suggestions.

job_post_data.title: Full-Stack Developer for Custom Inventory Management Web App
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a full-stack developer to build a new internal **inventory and asset tracking system** (web app). Needs complex search, barcode integration, and reporting features.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and optimize a **machine learning model** for real-time delivery route optimization based on traffic and order density. Requires strong **Geospatial** experience.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a new **React Native mobile app** with **gamification** elements (points, badges, leaderboards) for internal employee training and engagement. Must integrate with our LMS.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build an **AI anomaly detection system** to monitor sensor data from industrial **IoT devices** in real-time. Requires experience with time-series data and stream processing.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a **Native iOS application** that uses **Augmented Reality (ARKit)** for virtual placement of furniture in a user's home. Must integrate with our product catalog API.

job_post_data.title: Full-Stack React/Django Developer for FinTech Compliance Tool
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a secure **FinTech compliance tool** (web app) for monitoring transaction patterns against regulatory rules. Requires a robust **Django** backend and a **React** dashboard.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Design and build a high-conversion, mobile-responsive **landing page** for our new SaaS product using **Webflow**. Must be fast-loading and integrate with HubSpot.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and train a sophisticated **NLP model** for a customer service chatbot that can escalate complex queries. Must have experience with conversational AI platforms.

job_post_data.title: React Native Developer for EdTech Lesson Management
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a new **React Native app** for teachers to manage lessons, track student submissions, and send notifications. Needs offline mode and strong data sync.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a new, highly scalable **NodeJS/TypeScript API backend** for a massive user-facing web application. Must use Redis caching and microservices architecture.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a secure **FinTech web dashboard** for B2B clients to manage fund transfers and viewing statements. **Python/Django** backend, **React** frontend. Requires experience with bank API integration.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Design and implement a high-performance **API gateway** in **GoLang** to manage traffic and authentication for all microservices. Needs expertise in secure, high-throughput systems.

job_post_data.title: Flutter Developer for B2B Client Reporting App
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a secure **Flutter mobile app** for B2B clients to view their monthly performance reports and dashboards. Needs secure login (OAuth) and clear data visualization.

job_post_data.title: React Developer for Complex Data Filtering UI
job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a React expert to implement a highly interactive, complex **data filtering and searching UI** for a customer database. Requires performance optimization for large datasets.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop an **AI model** to create **personalized learning pathways** for students based on their strengths, weaknesses, and career goals. EdTech experience highly valued.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Upgrade a large **Ruby on Rails e-commerce application** from Rails 5 to Rails 7. Requires fixing deprecations, updating gems, and ensuring all tests pass. Requires deep RoR expertise.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **secure investor portal** (web app) using **Next.js** for managing property investments, documents, and returns. Needs integration with financial APIs.

job_post_data.title: Flutter Developer for B2B Sales Catalog Mobile App
job_post_data.description_snippet: We need a **Flutter mobile app** for our sales team to showcase product catalogs offline. Needs high-resolution image caching and secure login.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking an **ML Engineer** specializing in **voice biometrics** for a secure authentication system. Requires expertise in speech recognition and deep learning models for verification.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop the front-end of a new **customer support web portal** using **React**. Needs a ticketing system UI, knowledge base search, and complex form submission.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a dedicated **Native Android app** for fleet drivers. Features include GPS tracking, route display, and secure communication with the dispatch center.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a **Python script** using libraries like BeautifulSoup/Scrapy to scrape data from 10 public websites, clean the data, and load it into a PostgreSQL database. Must handle proxies and rotation.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking a senior **Blockchain developer** to build a tokenization platform for real estate assets. Requires advanced knowledge of ERC-20, compliance, and multi-sig wallets.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a secure **Angular web portal** for physicians to view patient data pulled from various EMR/EHR systems. Must be **HIPAA compliant** and focus on speed.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build an advanced **time-series ML model** for hyper-local **weather forecasting**. Requires knowledge of atmospheric data analysis and real-time data ingestion.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a full-featured, user-friendly **quiz builder web application** (SaaS) for teachers. Must include drag-and-drop interface, question bank, and export functions.

job_post_data.title: Native iOS Developer for Secure Photo Vault App
job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **Native iOS mobile app** for securely storing private photos and documents. Requires Touch ID/Face ID authentication and strong local encryption.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Optimize an existing **Node.js/Express API** to achieve **sub-10ms latency** for high-volume financial data delivery. Requires strong performance tuning skills.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop an **AI/ML system** to automatically score and rank resumes for specific job descriptions. Requires strong **NLP** skills and experience with structured/unstructured data.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a complete **multi-vendor e-commerce marketplace** (web app) from scratch using the **MERN stack**. Key features: vendor dashboards, commissions, and complex search filters.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a **React Native app** for construction foremen to log daily progress, safety incidents, and photo documentation. Must handle large file uploads and offline sync.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Migrate our existing PHP monolith to **Azure cloud** using **Kubernetes (AKS)**. Requires writing Terraform scripts, setting up CI/CD with Azure DevOps, and ensuring zero downtime.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **semantic search engine** for our internal document repository. Must use modern **NLP models** (e.g., embeddings) to improve search relevance beyond keyword matching.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a dedicated **B2B marketing assets portal** (web app) where clients can download brand materials, case studies, and localized content. Needs secure login and analytics.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a fast **Flutter mobile app** that uses the camera to **scan barcodes** or QR codes, look up the product in our database, and add it to a cart. E-commerce focused.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Rebuild the front-end of our internal **CRM system** using **Vue.js** and Vuex. Focus on performance, state management, and complex data forms. Must be highly scalable.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and backtest an **AI/ML model** for high-frequency stock price prediction using advanced **time-series analysis** and financial indicators. **FinTech** experience is mandatory.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Rebuild our high-traffic **media blog** using **Next.js** for maximum SEO performance and loading speed. Must be integrated with a headless CMS (Contentful/Strapi).

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a **Native Android mobile app** for patients to securely schedule appointments and view test results. Must be **HIPAA compliant** and secure.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Need a DevOps expert to audit and harden the security configurations of our **Kubernetes clusters** and Docker containers. Focus on FinTech best practices.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Complete **UX/UI overhaul** for our existing **e-commerce mobile application**. Focus on improving product discoverability, cart flow, and conversion rates. Deliverables: Figma files and design system updates.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **gamified educational platform** (web app) with leaderboards, points systems, and achievements to drive user engagement. **React** front-end, custom backend.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop and deploy a high-accuracy **customer churn prediction model** for our subscription service. Requires strong time-series and classification model experience.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **React Native mobile app** for warehouse staff to quickly scan inventory, update stock levels, and track bin locations. Needs fast performance and offline capability.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a new B2B client portal (web app) using a **Laravel backend** and **Vue.js frontend**. Features: custom invoice viewing, secure file sharing, and internal messaging.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Set up and manage the entire **AWS infrastructure** for ingesting and processing data from 10k+ **IoT devices**. Focus on Kinesis, Lambda, and cost optimization.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a **Flutter mobile app** for real estate agents to manage leads, showings, and contact information. Needs offline capability and push notifications.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Build a new customer **loyalty program web platform** for a FinTech company. Needs gamification, points tracking, and secure integration with bank APIs.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Develop a dedicated **Native iOS app** for logistics supervisors to manage, edit, and export daily route manifests. Needs integration with Google Maps and offline data storage.

job_post_data.description_snippet: Seeking an expert to build a **secure, smart-contract based escrow service** for high-value B2B transactions. Requires formal verification and multi-signature wallet expertise.
